snippet: Richard X. Bove, the outspoken banking analyst, believes that if the Mexican government forces Citigroup to sell off Banamex, that could actually be a blessing in disguise.
lead_paragraph: The news on Monday that the Mexican government may eventually force Citigroup to give up control of its Mexican subsidiary, Banamex, could be seen as the latest setback for the troubled banking giant. But Richard X. Bove, the outspoken analyst from Rochdale Securities, believes that any forced divestiture could actually be a blessing in disguise.

headline.main: Silver Lining Seen If Citigroup Loses Banamex
